Djao Djin Case Study

Djao Djin is a bootstrapped, open-sourced SaaS product that helps small companies and businesses manage customers and payment details all under a single roof.

For Djao Djin, I contribute regularly to their codebase, targeting updates and changes that relate to providing a more streamlined UI and UX experience. Along with mocking and proposing design changes, my responsibilities include building out approved work and making appropriate pull requests to repository.

The Djao Djin platform is built on Django, Vue.js, and Bootstrap.
